summary: The bill, titled the Maximizing Israel-U.S. Research Advancement and Collaborative Leadership in Emerging Medical Technology Act of 2025, aims to facilitate and coordinate collaboration between the U.S. and Israel on developing and delivering healthcare products and services. It focuses on several areas including research and development, innovation, regulatory harmonization, healthcare system strengthening, telemedicine, disease prevention, and biological product manufacturing.  The bill authorizes $8 million in appropriations annually from 2026-2030.
